ygData.subject: Hello?
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Everyone. Since there have no postings for a while, I have decided to take it upon myself to post one myself. This is another inquiry on the age-old
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Everyone.
Since there have no postings for a while, I have decided to take it
upon myself to post one myself.

This is another inquiry on the age-old art of fletching...again.

Since the patch where, it seems anyway, we are forced to fletch 5 units
at a time, with the skill increase remaining at 1 check per attempt,
instead of 5, has anyone had any difficulties making arrows?

I really want to get my archery up (its currently very pathetic) but i
have been holding out becasue i actually want to make my own arrows.
But if the fletching skill has been "gimped" (i guess is the word for
it now) i may not bother and i will just buy the arrows.

Any input on the "new and improved?" fletching skill would be
appreciated.

And on a related topic:
I had previously stated that most fletching components could be found
in Grobb. I have found out recently that this isnt the case. They only
have medium nocks there.
Friends had checked for me and they said that they found most of the
components. I assumed that it was Grobb that they were found in, since
that is one of my friends home town.
He will check in Oggok for me, its possible thats where they were.

I appolgize for the misinformation.

Bathory
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
